channel.title: Yaklab on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Yaklab on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: yakLab build out
item.description: The yakLab is a place where yaks are electronically instantiated for the purpose of learning and documenting. The lab consists of a virtualization host (virthost) which has 64GB of memory and hosts all the virtual machines, primarily for infrastructure.
